item.title: Gruva Guy
item.description: English Gruva Guy YouTube   Twitter   Twitch   Discord   Patreon   gruvaguy@gmail.com Gmail const copyToClipboard = (elementId) = { const temp = document.createElement("input"); const text = document.getElementById(elementId).innerHTML; temp.setAttribute("value", text); document.body.appendChild(temp); temp.select(); document.execCommand("copy"); document.body.removeChild(temp); }; English content creator that only uploads in english. Specialized in farming and technical bedrock minecraft. Donations Patreon   | Patreon |
